examples: I'm a terrible cook , so I eat a lot of frozen dinners.

definitions.definition: The head cook of a manor house .
The degree or quality of cookedness of food.
One who manufactures certain illegal drugs , especially meth .
examples: Police found two meth cooks working in the illicit lab.

definitions.definition: A session of manufacturing certain illegal drugs , especially meth .
A fish, the European striped wrasse, Labrus mixtus .
An unintended solution to a chess problem, considered to spoil the problem.

main_definition: ( cooking ) A person who prepares food.
secondary_definitions: ( cooking ) The head cook of a manor house .
( cooking ) The degree or quality of cookedness of food.
( slang ) One who manufactures certain illegal drugs , especially meth .
( slang ) A session of manufacturing certain illegal drugs , especially meth .
A fish, the European striped wrasse, Labrus mixtus .
( chess ) An unintended solution to a chess problem, considered to spoil the problem.
